com.iver.cit.gvsig.geoprocess.impl.buffer.fmap
Class BufferVisitor

java.lang.Object
  com.iver.cit.gvsig.geoprocess.impl.buffer.fmap.BufferVisitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.operations.strategies.FeatureVisitor
Direct Known Subclasses:
AttributeBufferVisitor, ConstantDistanceBufferVisitor
public abstract class BufferVisitor
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.operations.strategies.FeatureVisitor

Abstract base class to those all FeatureVisitor that computes geometry buffers.

Author:
azabala

verifyNilGeometry

public boolean verifyNilGeometry(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry newGeometry)
Verifys if a geometry buffer is null. It is useful when you're working with internal buffers. If the internal buffer distance is greater than the geometry radius, the buffer result will be null.

Parameters:
newGeometry -
Returns:
